SEARCH
Package Core.Utils

Class Constants

java.lang.Object
Core.Utils.Constants
public class Constants extends Object
The Constants class holds various static constants used in the 3D engine.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final org.joml.Vector3f
    AMBIENT_LIGHT
    The ambient light color represented as a Vector3f (RGB).
    static final float
    CAMERA_STEP
    The step size for camera movement.
    static final org.joml.Vector4f
    DEFAULT_COLOR
    The default color represented as a Vector4f (RGBA).
    static final float
    FOV
    The field of view for the camera, in radians.
    static final float
    FRAMERATE
    The target framerate for the 3D engine.
    static final float
    MOUSE_SENSITIVITY
    The sensitivity of the mouse for camera control.
    static final float
    SPECULAR_POWER
    The specular power used in lighting calculations.
    static final String
    TITLE
    The default title for the 3D engine.
    static final float
    Z_FAR
    The far clipping plane of the camera.
    static final float
    Z_NEAR
    The near clipping plane of the camera.
